00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <string>
00010 #include <sstream>
00011 #include <cstdlib>
00012 
00013 namespace lsf {
00014 namespace basic {
00015 
00017 // default use force type convert
00019 #define _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(type) \
00020     template <typename OutType>            \
00021     inline OutType TypeCast(type input) {  \
00022         return (OutType)input;             \
00023     }
00024 
00025 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(int8_t)
00026 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(int16_t)
00027 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(int32_t)
00028 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(int64_t)
00029 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(uint8_t)
00030 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(uint16_t)
00031 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(uint32_t)
00032 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(uint64_t)
00033 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(float)
00034 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(double)
00035 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(char)
00036 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(std::string const&)
00037 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT(char const*)
00038 
00039 #undef _LSF_TYPE_CAST_FORCE_CONVERT
00040 
00042 // template specialization, string to number
00044 #define _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(type, func, args...)     \
00045     template <>                                            \
00046     inline type TypeCast<type>(std::string const& input) { \
00047         try { return (type)func(input, ##args); }          \
00048         catch (std::exception& e) { return type(); }       \
00049     }                                                      \
00050     template <>                                            \
00051     inline type TypeCast<type>(char const* input) {        \
00052         try { return (type)func(input, ##args); }          \
00053         catch (std::exception& e) { return type(); }       \
00054     }
00055 
00056 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(int8_t,   std::stol, nullptr, 0);
00057 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(int16_t,  std::stol, nullptr, 0);
00058 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(int32_t,  std::stol, nullptr, 0);
00059 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(int64_t,  std::stoll);
00060 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(uint8_t,  std::stoul, nullptr, 0);
00061 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(uint16_t, std::stoul, nullptr, 0);
00062 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(uint32_t, std::stoul, nullptr, 0);
00063 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(uint64_t, std::stoull, nullptr, 0);
00064 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(float, std::stof);
00065 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL(double, std::stod);
00066 
00067 #undef _LSF_TYPE_CAST_STR_TO_ALL
00068 
00070 // template specialization, number to string
00072 #define _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(type)                    \
00073     template <>                                            \
00074     inline std::string TypeCast<std::string>(type input) { \
00075         return std::to_string(input);                      \
00076     }                                                      \
00077 
00078 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(int8_t)
00079 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(int16_t)
00080 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(int32_t)
00081 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(int64_t)
00082 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(uint8_t)
00083 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(uint16_t)
00084 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(uint32_t)
00085 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(uint64_t)
00086 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(char)
00087 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(float)
00088 _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR(double)
00089 
00090 #undef _LSF_TYPE_CAST_ALL_TO_STR
00091 
00092 }  // end of namespace basic
00093 }  // end of namespace lsf
